The iboss Cloud Connector for Chrome seamlessly integrates enterprise-owned Chromebooks and the Chrome browser with the iboss Zero Trust SASE platform, delivering comprehensive cloud security capabilities to your devices. This extension ensures that all Chrome traffic is directed through the iboss Zero Trust SASE platform, where it is meticulously secured and logged for complete visibility and control.

Key Features

- Seamless Integration: Effortlessly connect Chromebooks and Chrome browsers from any location to the iboss Zero Trust SASE platform, ensuring consistent security policies and logging across all devices.

- Traffic Redirection: The extension automatically redirects all Chrome traffic through the iboss Zero Trust SASE platform, applying security policies and generating detailed logs for monitoring and compliance.

- Enhanced Security: Leveraging zero trust principles, this solution ensures continuous user authentication, authorization, and validation at each access request, minimizing the risk of unauthorized access and data breaches. Advanced threat detection, data loss prevention, and real-time monitoring further safeguard organizational assets and maintain a secure environment.

- Easy Deployment: Utilize the Google Workspace management console to deploy the iboss Cloud Connector for Chrome, streamlining the setup process for IT administrators.

- Guest Access Mode: Securely connect guests and third-party entities to private resources through the Chrome browser. This feature simplifies onboarding by allowing external users to install the extension, apply provided credentials, and gain access without complex VPN setups or configurations.

By integrating with the iboss Zero Trust SASE platform, the iboss Cloud Connector for Chrome offers a robust and user-friendly solution for managing enterprise and third-party access, ensuring secure and compliant connectivity at all times. Enhance your Chrome security and streamline access management with the iboss Cloud Connector for Chrome.
